message: I stare. His face is perfect, unblemished. The acid didn't burn him at all.
...Wait. What part of his face is "weird?"
What part am I supposed to hate?!
Forget weird... He's beautiful.
I know that's a weird thing to say about another dude, but there it is.
Clear suddenly turns away, a hurt expression on his face. He must have thought my staring meant something bad.

name: クリア
message: "...So it really is strange."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's not strange at all."

name: クリア
message: "It's all there?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: クリア
message: "Is my face... all there? Do I have a normal face with all the normal parts just like you or any other normal person?"
I reach for his face. Something tells me a gesture will serve better than words.

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's fine."
As he tries to pull away, I gently touch his cheek.

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's all there. You have eyes, a nose, and a mouth... just like I do."
I trace the lines of his face with my fingertips.
From the delicate skin of his eyelids, down the bridge of his nose, and over his thin lips.
He even has two moles on his chin.

name: クリア
message: "...Really?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Really."
Timidly, Clear lifts his hands to my cheeks.
He runs his fingers toward my eyes. I close them, and feel his fingertips slide over my eyelids.
Then he draws them down over the bridge of my nose to my lips.
I hear him sigh softly as he pats my cheeks and chin like a baby feeling his father's face.

name: クリア
message: "I... have a face just like you, Master."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And I don't mean that we have exactly the same face. Just that they have the same parts."

name: クリア
message: "Master...!"
Tears well up in his eyes.

name: クリア
message: "Please say it again. Tell me I look just like you, Master. Please. Say it again."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're just like me. You don't look weird at all. You're normal, just like me."

name: クリア
message: "Really?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Really."

name: クリア
message: "...Thank you."
Clear smiles and lowers his head, his eyes still glistening with tears.
He looks so helpless like that, I gently embrace his head and stroke his fluffy hair.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, since you did take it off, make sure you go wash your face properly, okay? It doesn't look like there's any left, but... just in case."

name: クリア
message: "Okay..."
Clear nods.
But I still have questions.
The gas mask might have protected his face, but what about the rest of him?
Those yakuza kicked the shit out of him. How can he be fine?
Still, I can't deny he looks fine. I assumed he was just pretending, but no. There isn't a scratch.
In which case...
...A preposterous thought crosses my mind.
It's absurd, the sort of idea that would normally never occur to me.
But as ridiculous, as impossible as it is, everything I've seen from Clear today makes me think that it could be true.
What if...
...What if Clear's not human?
